translation.en: [reporter 1] Next to the woman. Talking to the woman right now.
translation.it: …sta parlando con la donna.

translation.en: Coming in the door right now. Got him. There he is. That's him.
translation.it: Ora sta uscendo. Eccolo. È lui.

translation.en: Tim, how'd it go?
translation.it: Tim, com'è andata?

translation.en: Allegations against one basketball ref of betting on
translation.it: Tempesta sul basket: arbitro accusato di scommettere, e addirittura truccare, il risultato delle partite NBA.

translation.en: and even tilting the outcome of games is rocking the NBA.
translation.it: di scommettere, e addirittura truccare, il risultato delle partite NBA.

translation.en: [anchor 1] Commissioner David Stern said today
translation.it: Oggi il commissario David Stern ha detto

translation.en: it is the worst situation he has faced
translation.it: che è la situazione peggiore che abbia mai vissuto

translation.en: as head of the National Basketball Association.
translation.it: come capo dell'Associazione Nazionale di Basket.

translation.en: This is not anything other than an act of betrayal.
translation.it: Non è altro che un atto di tradimento.

translation.en: [news anchor 2] Former NBA ref Tim Donaghy
translation.it: Tim Donaghy, ex arbitro dell'NBA,

translation.en: pleaded guilty to betting on basketball games,
translation.it: si è dichiarato colpevole di scommesse sulle partite

translation.en: including games in which he was officiating.
translation.it: comprese quelle in cui arbitrava.

translation.en: [anchor 3] This amid allegations Donaghy may have been working with the Mafia
translation.it: Tra le accuse, Donaghy potrebbe aver collaborato con la mafia

translation.en: in a point-shaving scandal.
translation.it: per manipolare le partite.

translation.en: An official entrusted with the integrity of the game,
translation.it: Un ufficiale incaricato dell'integrità del gioco,

translation.en: now said to be receiving death threats.
translation.it: ora dice di ricevere minacce di morte.

translation.en: [reporter 2] Did your client ever make a call on the basketball court
translation.it: Il suo cliente ha mai preso decisioni in campo

translation.en: that was influenced by his association with gamblers?
translation.it: influenzate dal rapporto con i giocatori d'azzardo?

translation.en: There was no suggestion that he did anything inappropriate
translation.it: Non c'erano indizi di condotta inappropriata

translation.en: with respect to calling those games.
translation.it: rispetto a quelle partite.

translation.en: This is not a situation where games were manipulated or fixed.
translation.it: Non parliamo di partite manipolate o truccate.

translation.en: [reporter 2] He denies that it ever took place?
translation.it: Nega che sia mai successo?

translation.en: Absolutely unconditionally.
translation.it: Completamente.

translation.en: Uh, what are we doing here?
translation.it: Cosa stiamo facendo?

translation.en: I know what we're doing here, right?
translation.it: So cosa stiamo facendo.

translation.en: We… We are trying to figure out about Timmy's games.
translation.it: Parliamo delle partite di Timmy.

translation.en: [announcer] Tim Donaghy, one of the officials…
translation.it: Tim Donaghy, uno degli ufficiali…

translation.en: Everybody always asked, "Did he fix the games?" "Did he fix the games? Did he fix the games?" You know.
translation.it: Mi chiedevano sempre: "Truccava le partite?"

translation.en: [anchor] Donaghy's two alleged coconspirators, Thomas Martino and James Battista.
translation.it: I due presunti cospiratori di Donaghy, Thomas Martino e James Battista.

translation.en: He fixed them like a motherfucker. He was the greatest.
translation.it: Le truccava eccome. Era il più grande.

translation.en: That's my only positive thing I could say about him.
translation.it: È l'unica cosa positiva che posso dire su di lui.

translation.en: There was nobody that can control the whistle like Timmy did.
translation.it: Non c'era nessuno che controllasse il fischietto come faceva Timmy.

translation.en: One night he said it to me… And I remember he said it.
translation.it: …NON CI SONO BASI PER UNA RIVALUTAZIONE. Una sera me l'ha detto. E ricordo che disse:

translation.en: "I can influence games six points either way."
translation.it: "Posso truccare le partite di sei punti".

translation.en: [Tim] I did something that was stupid and unfathomable.
translation.it: Ho fatto una cosa stupida e incomprensibile.

translation.en: I had a great job. Great family, nice house, great cars.
translation.it: Avevo un ottimo lavoro. Una bella famiglia, una bella casa, belle auto.

translation.en: Man, did I fuck my life up.
translation.it: Ho mandato a puttane la mia vita.

translation.en: I grew up in Delaware County.
translation.it: Sono cresciuto nella contea di Delaware.

translation.en: I loved the game of basketball growing up.
translation.it: Ho sempre amato il basket.

translation.en: It's all I did, all I dreamt of, and all I wanted to be a part of.
translation.it: Era tutto ciò che facevo, sognavo e di cui volevo far parte.

translation.en: Growing up outside Philadelphia, the Sixers were great at the time.
translation.it: I Sixers di Philadelphia erano fantastici all'epoca.

translation.en: They won a Championship.
translation.it: Vinsero un campionato.

translation.en: -I never missed a game. -[whistling]
translation.it: Non perdevo una partita.

translation.en: My dad was a successful college referee.
translation.it: Mio padre era un arbitro di successo.

translation.en: [announcer] The officials? Jerry Donaghy from Havertown, Pennsylvania. David…
translation.it: Gli ufficiali? Jerry Donaghy di Havertown, Pennsylvania. David…

translation.en: [Tim] You know, I saw the friendships that he made with other officials.
translation.it: Vedevo le amicizie che stringeva con gli altri ufficiali.

translation.en: I saw the excitement that you get
translation.it: Vedevo l'emozione che si prova

translation.en: by being a part of the game at a very young age.
translation.it: nel far parte del gioco in tenera età.

translation.en: Delaware County's famous for being where a lot of NBA referees are from.
translation.it: La Contea di Delaware è patria famosa di molti arbitri dell'NBA.

translation.en: -[blows whistle] -T! Right here!
translation.it: T! Proprio qui!

translation.en: [Tim] Like Joe Crawford was a legend in Delaware County.
translation.it: Joe Crawford era una leggenda.

translation.en: You! Out of here!
translation.it: Tu! Fuori di qui!

translation.en: [Tim] Then you have Javie, Strom, Middleton,
translation.it: Poi c'erano Javie, Strom, Middleton,

translation.en: Nowitzki! Knock it off!
translation.it: Lavitsky! Smettila!

translation.en: [Tim] They were all from Philadelphia, so I thought to myself,
translation.it: Erano tutti di Philadelphia, così pensai:

translation.en: "If they can do it, why… why couldn't I?"
translation.it: "Se lo fanno loro, perché io no?"

translation.en: [video narrator] Welcome to the introduction to officiating mechanics.
translation.it: Benvenuti all'introduzione della meccanica arbitrale.

translation.en: [referee] This is how you start the clock. Disallowing a basket. No score.
translation.it: Il cronometro si avvia così. Negare un canestro. Nessun punto.

translation.en: Shot is made. Touchdown.
translation.it: Tiro. Touchdown.

translation.en: Three points.
translation.it: Tre punti.

translation.en: Travel.
translation.it: Infrazione di passi.

translation.en: Blocking. Holding. Pushing.
translation.it: Blocco. Trattenuta. Spinta.

translation.en: Charging.
translation.it: Sfondamento.

translation.en: [Tim] The NBA gave me a ticket to go out to California for my first NBA camp.
translation.it: L'NBA mi diede un biglietto per andare in California per il mio primo ritiro.

translation.en: From there, I was put on the staff to officiate in the CBA.
translation.it: Poi, venni messo nello staff per arbitrare il CBA.

translation.en: [announcer] Personable gentleman, nice to talk with.
translation.it: Prima di tutto, è un piacere parlare…

translation.en: [woman] I was a flight attendant, and Tim was in the CBA,
translation.it: Io facevo l'assistente di volo e Tim era nel CBA,

translation.en: which are the farm teams.
translation.it: il cosiddetto "vivaio".

translation.en: He came on my plane at six o'clock in the morning one morning,
translation.it: Un mattino, nel volo delle 6:00, venne sul mio aereo

translation.en: and he was as cute and cocky as all get-out,
translation.it: ed era carino e parecchio arrogante.

translation.en: and he said, "I'm gonna sit right by you."
translation.it: Disse: "Mi siedo vicino a te".

translation.en: And I said, "No, you're not. You're gonna sit in your seat." [laughs]
translation.it: E io risposi: "No, siediti al tuo posto".

translation.en: And he sat right by me. [laughs]
translation.it: E si sedette accanto a me.

translation.en: And so he just instantly made me laugh.
translation.it: E questa cosa mi fece ridere… all'istante.

translation.en: And made me laugh all the way from Moline to Chicago.
translation.it: CON UNO STUPIDO E mi fece ridere da Moline a Chicago.

translation.en: We got married on a beach. I was pregnant and barefoot.
translation.it: Ci sposammo su una spiaggia. Ero incinta e scalza.

translation.en: It was just he and I, right in front of the water.
translation.it: Eravamo solo lui e io, proprio di fronte al mare.

translation.en: We gave a disposable camera to someone who was standing there,
translation.it: Demmo una macchina fotografica usa e getta a un passante

translation.en: and they snapped the pictures, and that was it. [chuckles]
translation.it: che ci scattò delle foto.

translation.en: When he told me that his goal was to get into the NBA,
translation.it: Quando mi disse che il suo obiettivo era arrivare all'NBA,

translation.en: I thought, "That… That's great. That's fantastic."
translation.it: pensai: "È grandioso. Fantastico.

translation.en: "What a neat thing. You know, there are only 50 of them in the whole country."
translation.it: Che bello! Ce ne sono solo 50 in tutto il Paese".

translation.en: So really, whatever I could do to support him, I did.
translation.it: Quindi qualsiasi cosa potessi fare per sostenerlo, la feci.

translation.en: [Tim] When you're going through the minor leagues, there's a lot of lonely days on the road.
translation.it: Lavorando nei campionati minori si vivono molti giorni di solitudine.

translation.en: And you're saying, "Is this all worth it?"
translation.it: E ti chiedi: "Ne vale la pena?

translation.en: "Am I gonna make it? Am I going to be the one chosen?"
translation.it: "Ce la farò? Sarò io il prescelto?"

translation.en: The day that he got the phone call,
translation.it: Il giorno in cui ricevette la telefonata,

translation.en: he called me, and he said, "I got in."
translation.it: mi chiamò e disse: "Sono entrato".

translation.en: Three words. I got in.
translation.it: Due parole. "Sono entrato".

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -[announcer 1] Officials tonight. Paul Mihalak, Blane Reichelt, and Tim Donaghy.
translation.it: Ufficiali di stasera. Paul Mihalak, Blane Reichelt e Tim Donaghy.

translation.en: Mihalak, Reichelt, and Donaghy.
translation.it: Mihalak, Reichelt e Donaghy.

translation.en: [Tim] My first NBA game after I was hired was Houston at Indiana.
translation.it: La mia prima partita in NBA dopo l'ingaggio fu Houston-Indiana.

translation.en: [announcer 1] And the Rockets win the tip.
translation.it: I Rockets vincono la palla.

translation.en: [Tim] Reggie Miller, he loved to hold and grab coming off screens.
translation.it: Reggie Miller amava le trattenute e le prese fuori dal blocco.

translation.en: He loved to pump-fake and jump into people.
translation.it: Amava fare le finte e saltare sull'avversario.

translation.en: It was a close game.
translation.it: Fu una partita equa.

translation.en: [announcer 1] Taking it down to Olajuwon. Spinning to the middle.
translation.it: La porta a Olajuwon. Gira verso il centro.

translation.en: [Tim] I made a call at the end of the game where Reggie Miller
translation.it: A fine partita fischiai fallo, Reggie Miller

translation.en: jumped into Hakeem Olajuwon. Threw his shoulder right into him.
translation.it: saltò addosso a Hakeem Olajuwon e gli diede una spallata.

translation.en: -[whistle blows] -[announcer 1] And Olajuwon fouled.
translation.it: Fallo a favore di Olajuwon.

translation.en: They're gonna call an offensive foul on Reggie Miller!
translation.it: Fallo di sfondamento per Reggie Miller!

translation.en: Oh boy, that took a lot of guts by that young official,
translation.it: Cavolo, quel giovane ufficiale ha proprio fegato,

translation.en: and boy, look at the debris come out on the court…
translation.it: e guardate cos'è stato lanciato in campo…

translation.en: [Tim] The Indiana fans just went berserk and were throwing stuff on the floor for, felt like, two hours.
translation.it: I tifosi dell'Indiana impazzirono e lanciarono roba per due ore.

translation.en: I kept saying to Paul Mehalik, you know,
translation.it: Dicevo a Paul Mehalik:

translation.en: "There's only a couple seconds left in the game." "Just put the ball in play."
translation.it: "Mancano un paio di secondi alla fine. Rimetti la palla in gioco".

translation.en: He says, "I can't!"
translation.it: E lui: "Non posso!

translation.en: He says, "It's like a hockey rink out here. Somebody's gonna get hurt."
translation.it: Sembra una pista da hockey. Qualcuno si farà male".

translation.en: [announcer 1] I've never seen anything like it.
translation.it: Non ho mai visto una cosa simile.

translation.en: This is my tenth year, and I have never seen this before. Never.
translation.it: Questo è il mio decimo anno e non l'ho mai visto prima. Mai.

translation.en: The Houston Rockets, trying to get off the court in a hurry.
translation.it: Gli Houston Rockets cercano di lasciare il campo in fretta.

translation.en: [Tim] The supervisor at the time took the game tape.
translation.it: Il supervisore prese il video della partita.

translation.en: He looked at me, and he said,
translation.it: Mi guardò e disse:

translation.en: "We'll find out real quick if you'll make it in this league."
translation.it: "Scopriremo presto se arriverai a fine campionato".

translation.en: And we went back to the hotel room and watched the tape.
translation.it: Tornammo in hotel e guardammo la cassetta.

translation.en: And he said it was the right call.
translation.it: Disse che avevo ragione.

translation.en: [announcer 1] If this young man's gonna grow up to be an official in this league,
translation.it: Se questo giovane diventerà un ufficiale,

translation.en: he's going to have to make the tough call, and he did the right thing.
translation.it: dovrà prendere difficili decisioni e ha fatto la cosa giusta.

translation.en: When Tim was hired by the NBA,
translation.it: Quando Tim venne assunto dall'NBA,

translation.en: I could just tell his whole demeanor changed.
translation.it: vidi che il suo atteggiamento era cambiato.

translation.en: He was like, "Yes."
translation.it: Era tipo: "Sì".

translation.en: [announcer 1] Jason Kidd, beautiful move around Kenny Smith.
translation.it: Jason Kidd, bella mossa intorno a Kenny Smith, segna ed è fallo.

translation.en: It goes, and he's fouled.
translation.it: intorno a Kenny Smith, segna ed è fallo.

translation.en: [man] You know, I never really cared for the NBA.
translation.it: Non mi era mai importato dell'NBA.

translation.en: I used to watch it just because Tim was reffing the games.
translation.it: La guardavo solo perché arbitrava Tim.

translation.en: [Kim] Tommy has been, and will always be, Tim's partner in crime.
translation.it: Tommy è stato e sempre sarà il complice di Tim.

translation.en: The two of them fed off of each other.
translation.it: Si influenzavano a vicenda.

translation.en: [Tommy] I made a lot of bad decisions as a kid.
translation.it: Da ragazzino feci molte scelte sbagliate.

translation.en: One day, when I was in first grade,
translation.it: Un giorno, ero in prima elementare,

translation.en: this bird took a shit on the pole.
translation.it: un uccello fece la cacca su un palo. NIENTE PAROLACCE SIATE RISPETTOSI

translation.en: And I'm thinking to myself,
translation.it: E pensavo tra me e me

translation.en: I wanted to taste the bird shit.
translation.it: che volevo assaggiarla.

translation.en: So I tasted the bird shit.
translation.it: E la assaggiai.

translation.en: I felt, like, this out-of-body experience,
translation.it: Fu un'esperienza extracorporea

translation.en: and I knew I did something wrong.
translation.it: e sapevo di aver fatto qualcosa di sbagliato.

translation.en: Maybe early on,
translation.it: Forse all'inizio

translation.en: I had a penchant for risk-taking.
translation.it: avevo un debole per il rischio.

translation.en: [Tim chuckling] One of those guys that all the girls loved.
translation.it: Era uno di quelli che tutte le ragazze adoravano.

translation.en: Athletic, funny, good-looking kid that everybody liked.
translation.it: Atletico, divertente e di bell'aspetto, che piaceva a tutti.

translation.en: He had good street smarts. Easygoing, always made people happy.
translation.it: Era un tipo sveglio. Alla mano, rendeva sempre felice la gente.

translation.en: You wanted to be around Tommy.
translation.it: Volevi stare con Tommy.

translation.en: [Tommy] Baba and Donaghy were not friends. They were acquaintances.
translation.it: Baba e Donaghy non erano amici. Erano conoscenti.

translation.en: I was friends with Jimmy. I was friends with Timmy.
translation.it: Io ero amico di Jimmy ed ero amico di Timmy.

translation.en: -[ominous music playing] -I was their link.
translation.it: Ero ciò che li collegava.

translation.en: All three of us went to Cardinal O'Hara High School together.
translation.it: Frequentammo tutti e tre il liceo Cardinal O'Hara.

translation.en: Tim was hilarious.
translation.it: Tim era esilarante.

translation.en: He was the prankster, you know. He was the guy pulling the fire alarm.
translation.it: Era quello che ha attivava l'allarme antincendio.

translation.en: Jimmy was a God-fearing, churchgoing boy just like we were.
translation.it: Jimmy era un timorato di Dio che andava in chiesa, come noi.

translation.en: And his family was very strict with him.
translation.it: E la sua famiglia era molto severa.

translation.en: Maybe that's why he rebelled a little bit.
translation.it: Forse è per questo che si ribellava.

translation.en: And got mixed up with them guys.
translation.it: E io mi mescolai a loro.

translation.en: [Jimmy] I graduated high school by the skin of my teeth 'cause I didn't give a fuck.
translation.it: Mi diplomai per il rotto della cuffia perché non me ne fregava un cazzo.

translation.en: But I got a job at a restaurant called Lombardo's.
translation.it: Ma trovai lavoro in un ristorante chiamato Lombardo's.

translation.en: Louis Lombardo, Lump, he gave me a job, and I worked as a waiter.
translation.it: Louis Lombardo, Lump, mi diede un lavoro come cameriere.

translation.en: I saw a different side of the world.
translation.it: Vidi un'altra faccia del mondo.

translation.en: People were drinking and partying in the '80s. Coke was good. Money was good.
translation.it: Negli anni '80 si beveva e si faceva festa. C'erano la coca, i soldi.

translation.en: Everyone was living and loving life.
translation.it: Tutti vivevano e amavano la vita.

translation.en: [announcer] Back at Wrigley Field, here are the lineups. For the Phillies…
translation.it: Le formazioni al Wrigley Field. Per i Phillies…

translation.en: [Jimmy] There was a customer, wanted a special order.
translation.it: Un cliente volle un ordine speciale.

translation.en: He goes, "Can I get a dime on the Phillies tonight?"
translation.it: Disse: "Posso puntare un centesimo sui Phillies?"

translation.en: Lump took the bet.
translation.it: Lump accettò.

translation.en: [announcer] Double-play ball! Nice play out at second! And Cubs win!
translation.it: …e la prenderà. Bel gioco in seconda posizione! E i Cubs vincono…

translation.en: [Jimmy] Phillies lost that night.
translation.it: I Phillies persero.

translation.en: Here I am working, hoping to make 300 a night as a waiter.
translation.it: Come cameriere speravo di fare 300 dollari a sera

translation.en: "I said, "That motherfucker made $1,000 not doing nothing!"
translation.it: e quello ne ha fatti 1.000 senza far nulla.

translation.en: And right there, that started my love for gambling.
translation.it: E lì nacque il mio amore per il gioco d'azzardo.

translation.en: -[intriguing music playing] -A nickel was 500.
translation.it: Un nichelino erano 500 dollari.

translation.en: A dime is a thousand.
translation.it: Un centesimo, mille dollari.

translation.en: A stick is a hundred thousand.
translation.it: Uno stick, centomila dollari.

translation.en: And if you got into my world, you deal with balloons,
translation.it: E nel mio mondo, c'erano i balloon,

translation.en: and that was a million.
translation.it: ovvero un milione.

translation.en: Nickel, dime, stick, and balloon.
translation.it: Nichelini, centesimi, stick e balloon.

translation.en: If you didn't know what they were, you weren't invited to the party.
translation.it: Se non sapevi cosa fossero, non eri invitato.

translation.en: The Animals…
translation.it: Gli Animali.

translation.en: We were a group of gambling bookmakers from the Philadelphia area.
translation.it: Eravamo un gruppo di allibratori della zona di Philadelphia.

translation.en: We were young kids, booking, betting.
translation.it: Eravamo ragazzini, scommettevamo.

translation.en: We became a player because our information and knowledge hurt people.
translation.it: Le nostre informazioni e conoscenze danneggiavano le persone.

translation.en: We were taking money out of people's pockets,
translation.it: Prendevamo soldi dalle loro tasche

translation.en: and we were good.
translation.it: ed eravamo a posto così.

translation.en: [announcer 1] This is a chance for 'em to put it away.
translation.it: …è la loro occasione…

translation.en: [Jimmy] Any sporting event that we can get inside information on.
translation.it: Ogni evento sportivo su cui avevamo informazioni riservate.

translation.en: College football. College basketball.
translation.it: Football universitario. Basket universitario.

translation.en: NBA. We didn't care what league it was.
translation.it: NBA. Non ci importava il campionato, anche due scarafaggi,

translation.en: If it was two fucking cockroaches, it was about getting the right information.
translation.it: Non ci importava il campionato, anche due scarafaggi, si trattava di avere le informazioni giuste. E io ero bravo

translation.en: And I had a good personality
translation.it: si trattava di avere le informazioni giuste. E io ero bravo

translation.en: to get information out of people on a one-to-one basis.
translation.it: a ottenere informazioni dalle persone.

translation.en: [announcer 3] He's gonna trap all over. They have nothing to lose,
translation.it: Arriverà in fondo. Non hanno niente da perdere,

translation.en: so it's gonna be a half-court…
translation.it: sarà da metà campo…

translation.en: -And a technical foul is called. -[announcer 3] That's gonna be on Juwan--
translation.it: E viene fischiato un fallo tecnico. Sarà su Juwan…

translation.en: -[announcer 4] Hanging on the rim. -[announcer 3] It won't…
translation.it: - Si è appeso. - No, non sarà…

translation.en: [Tim] When you're hired into the league, you think everything is done
translation.it: Se lavori nel campionato, pensi che tutto sia fatto

translation.en: based on the rules how they're written in the rule book.
translation.it: sulla base delle regole da loro scritte.

translation.en: You quickly learn, if you're gonna survive, that's not the way things are done.
translation.it: Impari in fretta. Se vuoi sopravvivere, non è così che funziona.

translation.en: I started to understand the game within the game of the NBA, and I'll give you an example.
translation.it: Iniziai a capire il gioco dell'NBA dall'interno, faccio un esempio.

translation.en: I was in Philadelphia, and I'm refereeing Sixers-Bulls.
translation.it: Ero a Philadelphia e arbitravo i Sixers contro i Bulls.

translation.en: They were cracking down on a spin move
translation.it: Volevano che fischiassimo un passo con avvitamento

translation.en: that they wanted the officials to call traveling.
translation.it: Volevano che fischiassimo un passo con avvitamento come infrazione di passi.

translation.en: And Michael Jordan does the spin move, and I make the call.
translation.it: Michael Jordan lo fece e io fischiai.

translation.en: [announcer] Michael on the block, travel.
translation.it: Michael blocca, infrazione di passi.

translation.en: [Tim] Phil Jackson comes flying off the bench, and he starts giving me shit.
translation.it: Phil Jackson si alzò dalla panchina e iniziò a maledirmi.

translation.en: And I say, "Wait a second, Phil. You know as well as I do,
translation.it: Io dissi: "Phil, sai quanto me

translation.en: that's the spin move that they're telling us to call."
translation.it: che vogliono che fischiamo quel passo".

translation.en: And he said, "They may want that play called,
translation.it: E lui: "Vogliono che lo fischiate,

translation.en: but they certainly don't want it called on him."
translation.it: ma di certo non quando lo fa lui".

translation.en: And he pointed at Jordan, who walked by and just stared at me.
translation.it: E indicò Jordan che stava passando e mi fissava.

translation.en: I got in the locker room. The other referee said,
translation.it: Entrai negli spogliatoi. L'altro arbitro disse:

translation.en: "They want that call, but don't call it on him."
translation.it: "Fischialo, ma non se lo fa lui".

translation.en: The way David Stern structured the league,
translation.it: Nella struttura del campionato di David Stern,

translation.en: we as officials knew that it was better
translation.it: noi arbitri sapevamo che era meglio

translation.en: to treat the star players better than others.
translation.it: trattare i fuoriclasse meglio degli altri.

translation.en: I just wanted to be the best referee and advance up the ladder,
translation.it: Io volevo essere il miglior arbitro e avanzare di carriera,

translation.en: and I saw the way guys that were in the NBA Finals handled the game.
translation.it: e vedevo come gestivano le partite i ragazzi delle finali NBA.

translation.en: They didn't call fouls against the stars, and they were well-respected.
translation.it: Non fischiavano falli alle star e venivano rispettati.

translation.en: These people that pay thousands of dollars to sit courtside here,
translation.it: Chi pagava centinaia di dollari per sedere in prima fila,

translation.en: they didn't come here to see Kobe Bryant, LeBron James,
translation.it: non veniva per vedere Kobe Bryant, LeBron James,

translation.en: Shaquille O'Neal sit on the bench.
translation.it: Shaquille O'Neal in panchina.

translation.en: They came to see them play.
translation.it: Veniva a vederli giocare.

translation.en: The league's your boss, and you want them to think
translation.it: Sono i tuoi capi e vuoi che pensino

translation.en: you're doing a good job because, if that's the case,
translation.it: che stai lavorando bene, perché poi

translation.en: you're on that playoff roster that comes out.
translation.it: sei presente sulla lista dei playoff

translation.en: With that is an enormous amount more money and… and respect.
translation.it: e quella ti garantisce grosse quantità di denaro e rispetto.

translation.en: -[knocking] -[official] Yo! Timothy!
translation.it: Ehi! Timothy!

translation.en: [Tim] As an official, if you were on a ten-day trip
translation.it: Se facevi un viaggio di dieci giorni

translation.en: and you were with the same guys, it was like a brotherhood.
translation.it: con gli stessi ragazzi, diventava una sorta di fratellanza.

translation.en: You became family, really.
translation.it: Si diventava una famiglia.

translation.en: Scott Foster, he was, you know, like a brother to me.
translation.it: Scott Foster era come un fratello per me.

translation.en: It was written in the contract that you couldn't place a bet of any kind.
translation.it: Nel contratto c'era scritto che non si poteva scommettere.

translation.en: Whether it was a golf match or going to a casino.
translation.it: Che fosse una partita di golf o andare in un casinò.

translation.en: A lot of the referees went to the casinos on the road and liked to gamble.
translation.it: Molti arbitri andavano al casinò e amavano giocare d'azzardo.

translation.en: Sometimes we'd play little games as officials.
translation.it: A volte facevamo dei giochetti tra arbitri.

translation.en: A lot of times, starting the games,
translation.it: Spesso, all'inizio delle partite,

translation.en: we would bet who called the first foul of the game.
translation.it: scommettevamo su chi avrebbe fischiato per primo.

translation.en: [announcer 1] That's slapped away by Strickland.
translation.it: Cassell, strappata via da Strickland.

translation.en: [Tim] Twenty bucks, thirty bucks, fifty bucks, dinner that night.
translation.it: Venti dollari, trenta, cinquanta, la cena di quella sera.

translation.en: We did it one time and got to the two or three-minute mark of the first quarter,
translation.it: Una volta l'abbiamo fatto e al secondo, terzo minuto del primo periodo,

translation.en: and bodies were fucking flying all over the place.
translation.it: c'erano uomini che volavano dappertutto.

translation.en: -A lot of that stuff went on. -[intriguing music continues]
translation.it: Un sacco di cose del genere.

translation.en: [announcer 2] Now he's not getting the call--
translation.it: …non gli viene fischiato…

translation.en: [announcer 3] And a technical foul. Tim Donaghy calls a technical.
translation.it: Fallo tecnico. Tim Donaghy fischia un fallo tecnico.

translation.en: And his second one. And Tim Donaghy has missed several calls tonight,
translation.it: E il secondo… Tim Donaghy ha fischiato molti falli stasera

translation.en: and when Mike Dunleavy complains, Donaghy tosses him out of the game.
translation.it: e quando Mike Dunleavy si lamenta, Donaghy lo butta fuori.

translation.en: [Kim] When I noticed that things were shifting,
translation.it: Ho notato che le cose stavano cambiando

translation.en: he would come home,
translation.it: quando tornava a casa

translation.en: and I didn't know
translation.it: e non sapevo

translation.en: what Tim I was gonna get when he walked in the door.
translation.it: quale Tim sarebbe entrato dalla porta.

translation.en: I didn't know if I was gonna get happy, fun Tim
translation.it: Non sapevo se sarebbe stato il Tim spassoso e divertente,

translation.en: or if I was gonna get the Tim that dropped his bag
translation.it: o il Tim che buttava il borsone

translation.en: at the bottom of the stairs and just walk up to his room and get on the phone.
translation.it: in fondo alle scale, saliva in camera e si metteva al telefono.

translation.en: [announcer 3] And Bonzi Wells has been tossed,
translation.it: Bonzi Wells è stato battuto fuori.

translation.en: and Tim Donaghy with quick whistles all night long.
translation.it: Tim Donaghy ha fischiato parecchio tutta la sera.

translation.en: And Bonzi Wells now joins Mike Dunleavy in the Portland locker room.
translation.it: E Bonzi Wells raggiunge Mike Dunleavy nello spogliatoio del Portland.

translation.en: [announcer 2] You can't touch the official.
translation.it: Non si toccano gli arbitri.

translation.en: Right over the house. [Kim] Tim, it probably wouldn't be a very good idea.
translation.it: - Proprio qui fuori. - Tim, non credo che sia una buona idea.

translation.en: My parents still have nine months left here.
translation.it: I miei genitori restano qui ancora nove mesi.

translation.en: [Kim] I only knew who he was talking to when somebody called the house phone,
translation.it: Sapevo con chi parlava solo quando chiamavano sul telefono di casa,

translation.en: and it was usually Jack.
translation.it: e di solito era Jack.

translation.en: [Tim] Jack Concannon was a guy from Delaware County.
translation.it: Jack Concannon era un tizio della contea di Delaware.

translation.en: We played golf three, four times a week together.
translation.it: Giocavamo a golf tre o quattro volte a settimana.

translation.en: Jack and I started betting, uh… football, baseball.
translation.it: Io e Jack iniziammo a scommettere sul football, sul baseball.

translation.en: We just had a lot of fun together.
translation.it: Ci divertivamo molto insieme.

translation.en: When Jack would call the house, I would say, "Tim, your girlfriend's on the phone."
translation.it: Quando Jack chiamava a casa, dicevo: "Tim, è la tua ragazza".

translation.en: And he immediately knew that it was Jack
translation.it: E capiva subito che era Jack,

translation.en: because they talked five, six, seven times a day.
translation.it: si sentivano cinque, sei, sette volte al giorno.

translation.en: [Tim] It had 15 plays on it a day that, win or lose,
translation.it: Avevo un foglio con scritte 15 partite al giorno e che vincessimo o meno,

translation.en: it could mean five or ten thousand dollars.
translation.it: potevano essere cinque, diecimila dollari.

translation.en: We kind of went in partners.
translation.it: Diventammo soci.

translation.en: He put the bets in, and at the end of the week,
translation.it: Lui scommetteva e alla fine della settimana

translation.en: we would square up.
translation.it: regolavamo i conti.

translation.en: And then, I'll never forget, one time we went to play golf.
translation.it: Una volta andammo a giocare a golf.

translation.en: Before we played, he said,
translation.it: Prima di giocare mi disse:

translation.en: "Give me some winners of… of the games tonight in the NBA."
translation.it: "Dammi dei vincitori per le partite NBA di stasera".

translation.en: And I looked at the lines in the paper.
translation.it: E io guardai sul giornale.

translation.en: I knew who was refereeing the games because I looked at the master schedule.
translation.it: Sapevo chi arbitrava le partite, avevo controllato il programma.

translation.en: I gave him three plays,
translation.it: Gliene diedi tre

translation.en: and he called me up the next day and said, "Is it really that easy?"
translation.it: e il giorno dopo mi chiese: "È davvero così facile?"

translation.en: And I said, "Wh… What happened?"
translation.it: E io: "Cos'è successo?"

translation.en: And he goes, "They all won."
translation.it: "Hanno vinto tutte".

translation.en: [Jimmy] Jack Concannon was booking with The Animals.
translation.it: Jack Concannon piazzava scommesse con Gli Animali.

translation.en: Jack was a nickel better.
translation.it: Jack era un nichelino meglio.

translation.en: Jack's bets went up in denomination.
translation.it: Le sue puntate aumentarono di valore.

translation.en: From him betting a nickel, and he's up to two dimes or three dimes.
translation.it: Da un nichelino, passò a due o tre centesimi

translation.en: And I'm like, "Jack's not a two or three dime bettor."
translation.it: e Jack non era uno da due o tre centesimi.

translation.en: So I'm like, "Oh. What the hell's going on here?"
translation.it: Così mi chiesi: "Che diavolo sta succedendo?"

translation.en: [Tim] There was a lot of different information I could use to make these picks.
translation.it: C'erano molte informazioni che potevo usare per i pronostici.

translation.en: Referees would share information with each other.
translation.it: Gli arbitri si scambiano le informazioni.

translation.en: Maybe a referee had an issue with a coach or a player.
translation.it: Un arbitro aveva avuto un problema con un allenatore o un giocatore.

translation.en: Maybe a trainer came into the locker room
translation.it: O un allenatore era entrato negli spogliatoi

translation.en: before the game, said a couple of their players were hurt.
translation.it: prima della partita dicendo che c'erano degli infortunati.

translation.en: A lot of it was inside information.
translation.it: Molte erano informazioni riservate.

translation.en: [Kim] I was very well aware of the rule
translation.it: Sapevo che agli arbitri

translation.en: that referees were not allowed to bet on anything.
translation.it: non era permesso scommettere su niente.

translation.en: I remember telling him,
translation.it: Ricordo di avergli detto:

translation.en: "You better be careful."
translation.it: "Ti conviene stare attento.

translation.en: "If you go down, you're gonna take our whole family down with you."
translation.it: Se sprofondi, trascinerai con te tutta la tua famiglia".

translation.en: [Tim] Didn't need the money.
translation.it: Non era per i soldi.

translation.en: Between stock investments, between playoff bonuses,
translation.it: Tra gli investimenti in azioni, bonus dei playoff,

translation.en: I was making well close to 400,000 a year.
translation.it: guadagnavo quasi 400.000 dollari all'anno.

translation.en: I was near a line that I shouldn't have been near and then jumped over it, giving picks
translation.it: Ero vicino a un limite a cui non dovevo avvicinarmi e l'ho addirittura superato,

translation.en: on games that I was officiating in the NBA.
translation.it: dando soffiate sulle partite che arbitravo.

translation.en: [Jimmy] I find out that Jack was betting Timmy's games.
translation.it: Scoprii che Jack scommetteva sulle partite di Timmy.

translation.en: And if he's got that information,
translation.it: Se aveva quelle informazioni

translation.en: so I take it and run with it.
translation.it: io le prendevo e le sfruttavo.

translation.en: So if they were betting four or five dimes a game,
translation.it: Scommettevano quattro o cinque centesimi a partita,

translation.en: then we'll just bet ten or 20 times the amount.
translation.it: allora noi scommettevamo dieci, 20 volte tanto.

translation.en: He was a cash cow. It was incredible.
translation.it: Era una miniera d'oro. Incredibile.

translation.en: -Years later… -[metallic whoosh]
translation.it: Anni dopo…

translation.en: …I had a major falling-out with The Animals.
translation.it: feci un grosso litigio con Gli Animali.

translation.en: And we went our separate ways.
translation.it: Ci dividemmo.

translation.en: And that's when I decided to go after Tim.
translation.it: E fu allora che decisi di andare da Tim.

translation.en: Go sit down, bitch!
translation.it: Siediti, stronzo!

translation.en: Tommy, Patty, just wanna say congratulations.
translation.it: Tommy, Patty, congratulazioni.

translation.en: I wish you the best of luck. Going to be a long life.
translation.it: Vi auguro tanta fortuna. Sarà una lunga vita.

translation.en: I hope you have many little kids, honey.
translation.it: Spero abbiate tanti bambini.

translation.en: God bless you. I love you, Tommy, from the bottom of my heart.
translation.it: Dio vi benedica. Vi voglio davvero tanto bene.

translation.en: Patty, take care of him. He's the best-paying boss in the world. -Thank you, I love you. [kisses] -[music fades]
translation.it: Patty, trattalo bene. È il capo che paga meglio. Vi voglio bene.

translation.en: [Tommy] Baba said, "When is Timmy in town again?"
translation.it: Baba disse: "Quando torna in città Timmy?

translation.en: "I need to meet up with him. He's in trouble."
translation.it: Devo incontrarlo. È nei guai".

translation.en: I said, "What? Tim? What do you mean he's in trouble?"
translation.it: E io: "Che vuol dire che è nei guai?"

translation.en: He goes, "Set up a meeting with him."
translation.it: Disse: "Organizza un incontro".

translation.en: So I said, "Okay."
translation.it: E io dissi: "Ok".

translation.en: I remember one time mentioning Battista's name
translation.it: Ricordo che al telefono, anni prima,

translation.en: to Donaghy on the phone years before that,
translation.it: feci il nome di Battista a Donaghy

translation.en: and he goes, "Tom, don't even mention his name on the phone with me."
translation.it: e lui disse: "Se parli con me, non nominarlo nemmeno.

translation.en: He said, "I cannot be associated
translation.it: Non posso essere associato

translation.en: with anything like bookmaking or betting or anything like that."
translation.it: a tutto ciò che riguarda il piazzare scommesse o scommettere in generale".

translation.en: So I never said that Battista wanted to meet up with him.
translation.it: Così non gli dissi mai che Battista voleva incontrarlo.

translation.en: [producer] Why is everybody's story about the Marriott so different?
translation.it: Perché la storia del Marriott ha versioni diverse?

translation.en: I think it's a… it's a… it's a, um…
translation.it: Credo che sia un…

translation.en: Dave, could we cut for a sec?
translation.it: Possiamo tagliare un attimo?

translation.en: [Tim] Tommy called me up and said he wanted to have dinner with me.
translation.it: Tommy mi chiamò dicendo che voleva cenare con me.

translation.en: He shows up with Battista, and I said to him immediately,
translation.it: Si presentò con Battista e gli dissi subito:

translation.en: "Tommy, what the fuck is he doing here? I can't be seen with him."
translation.it: "Che cazzo ci fa lui? Non possono vedermi con lui".

translation.en: -[tense music continues] -[Tommy] He looked at Battista, and then he looked at me like he saw a ghost.
translation.it: Guardò lui e poi me come se avesse visto un fantasma.

translation.en: We sat down at the table. Battista said, "Timmy, look, I know you're giving the games to Jack."
translation.it: Ci sedemmo a tavola e Battista disse: "Timmy, so che dai le soffiate a Jack".

translation.en: He said he knew that I had been giving Jack
translation.it: Sapeva che da un paio d'anni davo i pronostici a Jack

translation.en: picks for the last couple of years, and he was getting those picks…
translation.it: Sapeva che da un paio d'anni davo i pronostici a Jack e li usava anche lui.

translation.en: …and he wanted to continue to get those picks.
translation.it: E voleva continuare a farlo.

translation.en: [Jimmy] And I said, "Let's work together."
translation.it: Dissi: "Lavoriamo insieme.

translation.en: "But make me the sole guy."
translation.it: Ma rendimi il solo e unico".

translation.en: [Jimmy] Battista wrote on a napkin, "2K,"
translation.it: Battista scrisse "2.000" su un tovagliolo

translation.en: and he held up the napkin.
translation.it: e poi lo alzò dicendo:

translation.en: He goes, "I'll give you this. Give them to me."
translation.it: "Dalli a me. Ti darò questi".

translation.en: I made him the greatest deal in the world.
translation.it: Era l'affare perfetto.

translation.en: If we win the bets, I'll give you two dimes.
translation.it: Se vinciamo la scommessa, ti do due centesimi.

translation.en: -You're not gonna pay on your losses. -[metallic whoosh]
translation.it: Non ripagherai le perdite. NESSUNA PENALE IN CASO DI ERRORE

translation.en: Just fucking pick me winners. Give me the right side.
translation.it: Dammi le squadre vincenti. Dammi le soffiate giuste.

translation.en: [Tim] Tommy goes to the bathroom.
translation.it: Tommy andò in bagno.

translation.en: I was alone with Battista.
translation.it: Io restai solo con Battista.

translation.en: He says,
translation.it: Mi disse:

translation.en: "You don't want us calling the NBA and telling them what you've been doing."
translation.it: "Non farci chiamare l'NBA e dire loro cosa stai facendo.

translation.en: "Worse yet, you don't want somebody from New York visiting your wife and kids in Florida."
translation.it: O peggio, che qualcuno da New York vada dalla tua famiglia in Florida".

translation.en: [Kim] Okay, here's Bridget! Bridget's first birthday!
translation.it: Ecco Bridget! Il primo compleanno di Bridget!

translation.en: [Tim] And when he said that, I was scared.
translation.it: E quando disse così, ebbi paura.

translation.en: You know, not really of Battista
translation.it: Non di Battista nello specifico,

translation.en: but people that he was most likely dealing with.
translation.it: piuttosto della gente con cui aveva a che fare.

translation.en: [Kim] All right, are you ready?
translation.it: Ok, siete pronti?

translation.en: [Tim] The job I had, the family I had,
translation.it: Il lavoro che avevo, la famiglia che avevo…

translation.en: I really didn't have a choice.
translation.it: non avevo scelta.

translation.en: [Kim and Tim] Yay!
translation.it: Evviva!

translation.en: [producer] Had he not made the threat, would you have bet with him?
translation.it: Se non ti avesse minacciato, avresti scommesso con lui?

translation.en: No. If it wasn't for that, I definitely would not have bet with him
translation.it: Se non fosse stato per quello, non l'avrei fatto

translation.en: because I knew he was just a… a schmuck and an asshole.
translation.it: perché sapevo che era solo un coglione e uno stronzo.

translation.en: Anyone that had anything to do with him
translation.it: Chiunque avesse a che fare con lui,

translation.en: always, you know, moved away from him.
translation.it: si allontanava sempre da lui.

translation.en: Timmy was fucking thrilled to work with us. To make money.
translation.it: Timmy era entusiasta di lavorare con noi. Di fare soldi.

translation.en: [announcer] That's a tough call. I think it's the correct call…
translation.it: È una decisione difficile. Ottima scelta…

translation.en: Of all the fucked-up things I did, never threatened him.
translation.it: Ho fatto tante cazzate, ma non l'ho mai minacciato.

translation.en: You don't win people over threatening people. You get farther with honey.
translation.it: La gente non si convince con le minacce. Con la dolcezza vai più lontano.

translation.en: [Tommy] I did not see Battista threaten Donaghy,
translation.it: Non ho mai visto Battista minacciare Donaghy.

translation.en: and Battista's pissed off about this because he doesn't wanna be portrayed
translation.it: Battista è incazzato per questo, perché non vuole essere dipinto

translation.en: as the type of person that would go threaten people's families, and I don't think he is that type of person.
translation.it: come uno che minaccia le famiglie, e non credo che lo sia.

translation.en: I know he's not.
translation.it: So che non lo è.

translation.en: To me, it wasn't a life-or-death situation.
translation.it: Non era una questione di vita o di morte.

translation.en: If it was, I would have bailed.
translation.it: Altrimenti, avrei mollato.

translation.en: I'm not into that shit, you know?
translation.it: Non mi piace quella roba.

translation.en: [Tim] After our meeting at the Marriott that night,
translation.it: Dopo il nostro incontro al Marriott,

translation.en: I was in town to referee Boston at Philly.
translation.it: ero in città per arbitrare Boston-Philadelphia.

translation.en: The day prior, I was refereeing with Derrick Stafford.
translation.it: Il giorno prima avevo arbitrato con Derrick Stafford.

translation.en: He had said he felt like Mo Cheeks had no idea what he was doing,
translation.it: Diceva che Mo Cheeks non sapeva cosa stava facendo

translation.en: and his heart wasn't into coaching, and not only that,
translation.it: e non gli interessava allenare. Non solo,

translation.en: Philly was tanking games for better draft picks,
translation.it: puntavano a migliori scelte del draft,

translation.en: so they really weren't trying.
translation.it: quindi non si impegnavano.

translation.en: So, I told Battista to bet Boston.
translation.it: Dissi a Battista di scommettere su Boston.

translation.en: [announcer 1] …rebounding now.
translation.it: …ora rimbalza.

translation.en: Telfair quickly ahead to Allen. Allen takes it right at Iguodala for two.
translation.it: Telfair, avanti verso Allen. Allen sorpassa Iguodala da due.

translation.en: [announcer 2] Boy, that's what I like, quick up the floor.
translation.it: Così mi piace, rapidi.

translation.en: [announcer 1] Pierce 0 for 2 to start the game, and Iguodala goes coast to coast.
translation.it: Iniziamo con 0 a 2, Iguodala da una parte all'altra.

translation.en: Seven-point Philly lead, their biggest of the night.
translation.it: I Philadelphia sono sopra di sette punti.

translation.en: -Iguodala, his second steal and basket. -[dramatic electric guitar playing]
translation.it: Iguodala, il suo secondo tiro e canestro.

translation.en: Pierce to Allen, rebound, and he got fouled.
translation.it: Pierce ad Allen, rimbalzo. Fallo.

translation.en: Donaghy coming in from the outside.
translation.it: Donaghy entra dall'esterno.

translation.en: [announcer 2] Boy, and that booing in Philly.
translation.it: Quanti fischi a Philadelphia.

translation.en: I don't ever remember hearing them boo in Philly.
translation.it: Credo di non averne mai sentiti così tanti qui.

translation.en: At their own team!
translation.it: Alla loro squadra!

translation.en: [announcer 1] The Philadelphia losing streak gets longer,
translation.it: Aumentano le sconfitte del Philadelphia

translation.en: and Boston climbs to 8 and 13 now
translation.it: e Boston passa da 8 a 13 nella stagione.

translation.en: -on the season. -[buzzer ringing]
translation.it: e Boston passa da 8 a 13 nella stagione. LA SCOMMESSA DI DONAGHY VINCE

translation.en: After the Boston game, Battista came to me, and he said,
translation.it: Dopo la partita di Boston, Battista venne da me e disse:

translation.en: "Tim's new nickname is Elvis. Because he's the king."
translation.it: "Il nuovo soprannome di Tim è Elvis. Perché è il re".

translation.en: -[upbeat music playing] -And he was the king.
translation.it: E lo era davvero.

translation.en: [Tim] Battista was placing the bets,
translation.it: Battista piazzava le scommesse,

translation.en: getting the information through Tommy that came through me.
translation.it: riceveva le informazioni da Tommy che passava da me.

translation.en: I would never talk to Timmy. He had to go through Tommy.
translation.it: Non parlavo mai con Timmy. Passava da Tommy.

translation.en: [Tommy] Timmy would tell me who we would bet on
translation.it: Timmy mi diceva su chi scommettere

translation.en: by my brothers' names.
translation.it: usando i nomi dei miei fratelli.

translation.en: My brother Johnny moved to Jersey. He was the away team.
translation.it: Johnny si era trasferito nel Jersey. Era la squadra ospite.

translation.en: My brother Chuck stayed here, so he was the home team.
translation.it: Chuck era rimasto qui. Era la squadra locale.

translation.en: He'd say, "Hey, Tommy, what's going on? I'm in, uh, Boston."
translation.it: "Ehi, Tommy, come va? Sono a Boston".

translation.en: "Hey, how's Johnny doing?"
translation.it: "Ehi, come sta Johnny?"

translation.en: Yeah, "How's Johnny doing?" Or, "Who's he having Thanksgiving with?"
translation.it: "Come sta Johnny?" "Con chi passa il Ringraziamento?"

translation.en: "All right, call me tomorrow."
translation.it: "Va bene, chiamami domani".

translation.en: [Tommy] And I would relay it back to Battista.
translation.it: E lo riferivo a Battista.

translation.en: [Jimmy] I made a lot of money.
translation.it: Feci un sacco di soldi.

translation.en: There was a few million bet on each game that I was in control of.
translation.it: Si trattava di qualche milione di scommesse a partita.

translation.en: I was moving the most prominent gamblers in the world.
translation.it: Gestivo i giocatori d'azzardo più forti al mondo.

translation.en: I'd just charge them half, quarter, or 1%. We're moving millions of dollars a day?

translation.en: the top dog team in the Northwest Division at…
translation.it: la squadra più importante della Northwest Division e…

translation.it: Allen Iverson e Steve Javie erano in lite da anni.

translation.en: -I'm not gonna see everything, all right? -It happened so many times.
translation.it: Non vedrò tutto. - Allen… - È capitato mille volte.

translation.it: Ci fu un problema per cui Iverson minacciò Javie

translation.it: e pensammo che Iverson avrebbe dovuto essere sospeso.

translation.it: Prima della partita decidemmo di fischiare per palla accompagnata.

translation.it: Lo fece, sapevamo di poter fischiare, ma nessuno fischiò.

translation.en: I even called up Javie that day and told him to watch the game
translation.it: Chiamai Javie dicendogli di guardare la partita

translation.en: because we were gonna take justice into our own hands.
translation.it: perché ci saremmo fatti giustizia da soli.

translation.en: -[announcer 1] …Iverson. -[whistle blows]
translation.it: …Iverson.

translation.en: [announcer 1] And we got a palming violation.
translation.it: Fallo per palla accompagnata.

translation.it: Bernie fischiò il primo. Io fischiai il secondo.

translation.it: La situazione avrebbe messo sia Iverson che il Denver

translation.it: in svantaggio, così dissi a Battista di scommettere sullo Utah.

translation.it: In alcune partite pensavo: "Oh, mio Dio. Metti quel… Non…"

translation.en: He was… Some of it was very obvious.
translation.it: Alcune volte era palese.

translation.en: So I'm watching each game on the edge of my chair.
translation.it: Guardavo le partite sull'orlo della sedia.

translation.en: I need to relax.
translation.it: Dovevo rilassarmi.

translation.en: Pop a few OxyContins. Chill.

translation.it: Facevo sempre il bucato di Tim quando tornava a casa.

translation.it: Andai a buttare in lavatrice la sua giacca dell'NBA,

translation.en: And I put my hand in the pocket,
translation.it: misi la mano in tasca,

translation.en: and there was a wad of money about that big.
translation.it: e c'era una mazzetta di banconote grande così.

translation.en: And I thought,
translation.it: E pensai:

translation.en: "Wow, that's a lot of money."
translation.it: "Wow, sono tanti soldi.

translation.en: "I don't know if I want to know where it came from."
translation.it: Non so se voglio sapere da dove vengono".

translation.en: [reporter] John Gotti is the former Gambino family boss.
translation.it: John Gotti è l'ex boss della famiglia Gambino.

translation.en: Gotti was found guilty April 2nd
translation.it: Il 2 aprile è stato dichiarato colpevole

translation.en: of murder, racketeering, tax evasion, and other crimes.
translation.it: di omicidio, estorsione, evasione fiscale e altri reati.

translation.en: Gotti had escaped prosecution three times,
translation.it: Gotti era sfuggito all'accusa tre volte.

translation.en: garnering him the name "Teflon Don."
translation.it: Guadagnando il nome di "Teflon Don".

translation.en: [man] I was a member of the team that prosecuted John Gotti.
translation.it: Ero un membro del team dell'accusa di John Gotti.

translation.en: 2006, I was the supervisor of the FBI Gambino squad.
translation.it: Nel 2006 ero il supervisore della squadra Gambino dell'FBI.

translation.en: We were involved with murder investigations,
translation.it: Eravamo coinvolti in indagini per omicidio,

translation.en: international distribution of drugs, extortions.
translation.it: narcotraffico internazionale, estorsioni.

translation.en: We had a number of wires going on.
translation.it: Mettemmo i cavi per le intercettazioni.

translation.en: One of the peripheral wires picked up something about inside information going on with the NBA.
translation.it: Uno dei cavi periferici rilevò informazioni riservate nell'NBA.

translation.en: [Gambino goon] We've got a ref in our hip pocket.
translation.it: Abbiamo beccato un arbitro.

translation.en: [FBI detective] What's his name?
translation.it: Come si chiama?

translation.en: [Phil] Paul Harris was the case agent.
translation.it: Paul Harris era l'agente assegnato.

translation.en: He says, "Phil, we came up with three names."
translation.it: Mi disse: "Phil, abbiamo tre nomi".

translation.en: [FBI detective] What's his name?
translation.it: Come si chiama?

translation.en: [Gambino goon] Tim Donaghy.
translation.it: Tim Donaghy.

translation.en: [Phil] I didn't know Tim Donaghy from a hole in the wall,
translation.it: Non avevo idea di chi fosse Tim Donaghy,

translation.en: but the fact that he came up with an active referee
translation.it: ma il fatto che fosse un arbitro

translation.en: in the NBA was alarming.
translation.it: dell'NBA era preoccupante.

translation.en: He's working with somebody by the name of Martino
translation.it: Lavora con qualcuno di nome Martino

translation.en: and Battista, and they do a lot of talking.
translation.it: e Battista, e parlano molto.

translation.en: And because they do a lot of talking, there's information going to the Philadelphia mob.
translation.it: E siccome parlano molto, le informazioni vanno alla mafia di Philadelphia.

translation.en: There's information going offshore.
translation.it: Alcune poi vanno all'estero

translation.en: And there's information going to, our particular interest, in the Gambino family.
translation.it: e alcune vanno a chi interessa a noi, la famiglia Gambino.

translation.en: [Tim] There was always instances where you're alone with your thoughts in a hotel room.
translation.it: Capitava mi trovassi solo con i miei pensieri in una stanza d'albergo.

translation.en: And I said to myself,
translation.it: E mi dissi:

translation.en: "I shouldn't be doing this. This is not good."
translation.it: "Non dovrei farlo. Non va bene.

translation.en: "Eventually I'm gonna get caught."
translation.it: Prima o poi mi beccheranno".

translation.en: But we were winning.
translation.it: Ma stavamo vincendo.

translation.en: I was getting $2,000 for a correct pick,
translation.it: Ricevevo 2.000 dollari per ogni soffiata corretta

translation.en: and we're winning, like, 70 to 80% of the time.
translation.it: e vincevamo dal 70 all '80% delle volte.

translation.en: It got to the point where I forgot about Battista. I forgot about the threats.
translation.it: Arrivai al punto di dimenticare Battista e le minacce.

translation.en: We'll do this to the end of the year. I'm gonna have fun with it, and it's over.
translation.it: Lo faremo fino alla fine dell'anno. Mi divertirò e poi basta.

translation.en: -[dramatic synth music playing] -[whistle blows]
translation.it: MIAMI - NEW YORK 26 FEBBRAIO 2007

translation.en: I was refereeing with Stafford. He was buddies with Isaiah Thomas.
translation.it: Facevo l'arbitro con Stafford. Era amico di Isaiah Thomas.

translation.en: I knew Stafford didn't have a liking for Pat Riley, even a little bit.
translation.it: Sapevo che a Stafford non piaceva Pat Riley.

translation.en: And I knew any chance he got, he'd stick it to him because he was that type of referee.
translation.it: E sapevo che appena poteva si vendicava, perché era quel tipo di arbitro.

translation.en: [announcer] Pat Riley screaming for a foul call,
translation.it: SCOMMESSA DI DONAGHY: NEW YORK Pat Riley vuole fallo

translation.en: and a technical foul's gonna be called on Riley. He yelled at Derrick Stafford.
translation.it: e sarà chiamato un fallo tecnico su Riley. Ha urlato contro Stafford.

translation.en: Rose, on the drive inside, throws it to Crawford for three! Bang!
translation.it: Rose, all'interno, la tira a Crawford per il tre! Bang!

translation.en: The Knicks will win their sixth straight here at Madison Square Garden.
translation.it: I Knicks vincono la sesta partita consecutiva al Madison Square Garden.

translation.en: Timmy called me after every game was over at night,
translation.it: Timmy mi chiamava dopo ogni partita

translation.en: and he would say, "Good boy?" And I would say, "Good boy."
translation.it: e diceva: "Bravo bambino?" E io: "Bravo bambino".

translation.en: After every game.
translation.it: Dopo ogni partita.

translation.en: Now I had extra cash in my pocket. I was happy.
translation.it: Avevo più soldi in tasca. Ero felice.

translation.en: Tommy would come to one of the games,
translation.it: Tommy veniva a una delle partite

translation.en: brown paper bag just like they do in the movies, and hand it to me.
translation.it: con la busta di carta marrone come nei film, e me la dava.

translation.en: You know, it's weird because I was doing it for nothing.
translation.it: È strano perché io lo facevo gratis.

translation.en: But I will say this, every time I did drop money off to Timmy, he would give me some of it.
translation.it: Ma ogni volta che consegnavo i soldi a Timmy, lui me ne dava un po'.

translation.en: [Tim] When Tommy came with that brown paper bag full of money,
translation.it: Quando Tommy arrivava con tutti quei soldi

translation.en: we went to the nicest strip club, like we were rock stars, that you could ever imagine.
translation.it: andavamo negli strip club più belli, come le rock star.

translation.en: And we'd go to the, like… the tit… titty bars.
translation.it: E andavamo nei "bar delle tette".

translation.en: Can I say that on there?
translation.it: Si può dire?

translation.en: -[whistle blows] -[Tim] I'm refereeing with Joe Crawford.
translation.it: Arbitravo con Joe Crawford.

translation.en: A couple of weeks prior,
translation.it: Due settimane prima, aveva avuto uno scontro

translation.en: he had a run-in with one of the Heat's radio or TV announcers,
translation.it: Due settimane prima, aveva avuto uno scontro con uno dei commentatori e il proprietario degli Heat voleva licenziarlo.

translation.en: and the owner of the Heat wanted him fired.
translation.it: con uno dei commentatori e il proprietario degli Heat voleva licenziarlo.

translation.en: [announcer 1] …officials looking one another, Tim Donaghy and Joey Crawford.
translation.it: …gli ufficiali Tim Donaghy e Joey Crawford si guardano.

translation.en: [Tim] He was the top official in the league, and he could basically do whatever he wanted to do.
translation.it: Era l'arbitro principale del campionato e poteva fare quello che voleva.

translation.en: I knew any chance he got, he was gonna stick it to somebody.
translation.it: Sapevo che appena possibile si sarebbe vendicato.

translation.en: [announcer 1] Shot clock is down to three.
translation.it: Mancano tre secondi.

translation.en: And Howard is fouled by Posey.
translation.it: Posey fa fallo su Howard.

translation.en: [announcer 2] With Joe Crawford, you just don't argue.
translation.it: Con Joe Crawford non si discute.

translation.en: [announcer 1] Only the second home-court loss in February for the Heat in three seasons.
translation.it: In tre stagioni, è la sola seconda sconfitta in casa a febbraio per gli Heat.

translation.en: [Tim] We had a big bash for Kim's 40th.
translation.it: Facemmo una grande festa per i 40 anni di Kim.

translation.en: I bought her a pair of earrings that cost ten thousand dollars.
translation.it: Le comprai un paio di orecchini da 10.000 dollari.

translation.en: [Kim] My 40th birthday present were these earrings.
translation.it: Il mio regalo dei 40 anni sono questi orecchini.

translation.en: I've never taken them out because I'll probably lose them.
translation.it: Non li indosso mai fuori perché temo di perderli.

translation.en: [Tim] You know, things that you normally wouldn't buy, I was just buying.
translation.it: Compravo cose che normalmente non si comprerebbero.

translation.en: Mommy, look what I got!
translation.it: Mamma, guarda cos'ho!

translation.en: [Jimmy] I could lose three million one day,
translation.it: Potevo perdere tre milioni un giorno.

translation.en: win six million the next day.
translation.it: Farne sei il giorno dopo.

translation.en: I made good money.
translation.it: Guadagnavo bene.

translation.en: I was a fat fuck, snorting coke like a rock star.
translation.it: Ero un ciccione che sniffava coca come una rock star.

translation.en: [Tommy] I was getting Battista a lot of Percocets.
translation.it: Compravo a Battista un sacco di Percocet.

translation.en: He was getting Percocets himself. He was doing a lot of cocaine.
translation.it: La comprava anche da solo. Sniffava molta cocaina.

translation.en: I think I was getting him like an eight-ball a day.
translation.it: Probabilmente gli fornivo 3,5 grammi di coca al giorno.

translation.en: That was just… part of the problem.
translation.it: Era parte del problema.

translation.en: [announcer 1] Arenas splits defenders, challenges O'Neal.
translation.it: L'Arena divide i difensori. Sfida O'Neal.

translation.en: That's the kind of play Eddie Jordan would like to see a foul called, but--
translation.it: È il tipo di azione che Eddie Jordan vorrebbe vedere, ma…

translation.en: [announcer 2] Eddie is not happy at all with Tim Donaghy,
translation.it: Eddie non è affatto contento di Tim Donaghy,

translation.en: and he's gonna be very, very close, but he is…
translation.it: e ci andrà molto vicino, ma…

translation.en: [Tim] One time we lost three games in a row.
translation.it: Una volta perdemmo tre partite di fila.

translation.en: Tommy said Battista called him up screaming.
translation.it: Tommy disse che Battista lo chiamò urlando.

translation.en: I didn't know if I was gonna go home and find my dog strangled,
translation.it: Non sapevo se tornato a casa avrei trovato il cane strangolato,

translation.en: hanging from a tree somewhere, you know, as a message.
translation.it: appeso a un albero, come messaggio.

translation.en: But bottom line was, I wasn't fixing the games.
translation.it: Ma il punto era: non truccavo le partite.

translation.en: So I wasn't gonna go out there whether we lost ten in a row and fix a game.
translation.it: E non avrei cominciato a farlo anche se ne avessimo perse dieci di fila.

translation.en: I had inside information,
translation.it: Avevo informazioni riservate,

translation.en: and that's all I needed to make these picks correct.
translation.it: era tutto ciò che mi serviva per fare i pronostici.

translation.en: Get the fuck out of here!
translation.it: Smettila, cazzo!

translation.en: [Jimmy] He has a fucking whistle in his pocket.
translation.it: Ha un fottuto fischietto in tasca.

translation.en: He has the lottery ticket.
translation.it: Ha il biglietto della lotteria.

translation.en: For the record, I bet 47 games with Timmy.
translation.it: Per la cronaca, ho scommesso 47 partite con Timmy.

translation.en: We went 37 and ten.
translation.it: Vinte 37, perse dieci.

translation.en: Thirty-seven and ten by the number. We crushed the number.
translation.it: Trentasette a dieci. Abbiamo spaccato.

translation.en: he controlled the outcome.
translation.it: controllava il risultato.

translation.en: Elvis was the King of Rock.
translation.it: Elvis era il Re del Rock.

translation.en: And Timmy was the king of fixing games.
translation.it: E Timmy era il re delle partite truccate.

translation.en: [Tommy] We had an agreement at Marriott.
translation.it: Facemmo un accordo al Marriott.

translation.en: Shut the fuck up. The word was "cranberries" that we used.
translation.it: Chiudi il becco. Usavamo il termine "mirtilli rossi".

translation.en: "Cranberries" was the code. Shut your fucking mouth.
translation.it: "Mirtilli rossi" era il codice. Chiudi il becco.

translation.en: Keep it between us.
translation.it: Rimanga tra noi.

translation.en: Stick to the fucking story.
translation.it: Attieniti alla fottuta storia.

translation.en: Keep your mouth shut and don't tell anybody, but we all know that that's not what he did.
translation.it: Taci, non dirlo a nessuno, ma sappiamo che per lui non è stato così.

translation.en: Battista was giving these picks to guys
translation.it: Battista dava questi pronostici a gente

translation.en: that were generating millions and millions of dollars
translation.it: che generava milioni e milioni di dollari

translation.en: for the Gambino crime family.
translation.it: per la famiglia Gambino.

translation.en: Battista always wants to say he had nothing to do with the mob in New York,
translation.it: Battista diceva che non aveva nulla a che fare con la mafia di New York,

translation.en: but yet he's driving up and down once a week to drop off or pick up money.
translation.it: però, una volta a settimana andava a New York a prendere o lasciare soldi.

translation.en: I wasn't a mob guy, okay,
translation.it: Non ero un mafioso,

translation.en: but… did I dine with them at times?
translation.it: ma ho cenato con loro a volte?

translation.en: Fucking A, I did.
translation.it: Certo che sì, cazzo.

translation.en: We were moving serious money. You had to play protocols.
translation.it: Gestivamo tanti soldi. Dovevi seguire i protocolli.

translation.en: If I wasn't at that table, "Who the fuck are you?"
translation.it: Se non fossi stato a quel tavolo, "Chi cazzo sei?"

translation.en: [Phil] We did an analysis of hundreds and hundreds of phone records.
translation.it: Analizzammo centinaia e centinaia di tabulati telefonici.

translation.en: And they come to find out,
translation.it: E scoprirono che Battista

translation.en: Battista was making money for the mob.
translation.it: stava facendo soldi per la mafia.

translation.en: Now, was he somebody who was going to the weddings?
translation.it: Era un tipo che andava ai matrimoni?

translation.en: Was he someone who's going to the funerals?
translation.it: Uno che andava ai funerali? Frequentava i club?

translation.en: Was he somebody who was gonna hang out in the clubs? No.
translation.it: Uno che andava ai funerali? Frequentava i club? No.

translation.en: He wasn't a made guy.
translation.it: Non era un "picciotto".

translation.en: But, whether he wants to admit it or not,
translation.it: Ma, che lo ammetta o meno,

translation.en: he was making big money for all those entities.
translation.it: faceva un sacco di soldi per tutte quelle realtà.

translation.en: From what we understood, somewhere between 20 and 30 million dollars.
translation.it: Da quanto abbiamo capito, tra i 20 e i 30 milioni di dollari.

translation.en: [Tommy] I was on the beach in South Beach, Miami.
translation.it: Ero sulla spiaggia di South Beach, a Miami.

translation.en: My phone rings, and it's "unavailable."
translation.it: Squillò il telefono. Numero privato.

translation.en: So I answered.
translation.it: Allora risposi.

translation.en: "Hi. This is Agent Paul Harris."
translation.it: "Salve. Sono l'agente Paul Harris.

translation.en: It's the FBI.
translation.it: Sono dell'FBI".

translation.en: [Phil] Operation Flagrant Foul was the name of the special investigation.
translation.it: L'Operazione Fallo Personale era il nome dell'indagine speciale.

translation.en: When law enforcement comes knocking on your door,
translation.it: Quando la polizia ti bussa alla porta,

translation.en: most people have a degree of shock.
translation.it: molte persone restano scioccate.

translation.en: Especially if it's the first time.
translation.it: Soprattutto se è la prima volta.

translation.en: [Tommy] I shit myself.
translation.it: Mi cagai addosso.

translation.en: I got scared shitless. I didn't eat for a week.
translation.it: Mi spaventai a morte. Non mangiai per una settimana.

translation.en: And then when I got home, there they were.
translation.it: E quando tornai a casa, erano lì.

translation.en: They handed me a subpoena to appear before a grand jury. "We'll see you in a week."
translation.it: Mi diedero un mandato di comparizione. "Ci vediamo tra una settimana".

translation.en: I used to go to three meetings a day for sobriety.
translation.it: Andavo a tre riunioni degli AA ogni giorno.

translation.en: In the middle of a meeting, I get a text message. It goes,
translation.it: Durante una riunione ricevetti un SMS:

translation.en: "Jimmy, there's two FBI officers in the driveway. They're looking for you."
translation.it: "Ci sono due agenti dell'FBI nel vialetto che ti cercano".

translation.en: I said, "There's a Dunkin' Donuts up the street." "I'll meet you there for a cup of coffee."
translation.it: E io: "C'è un bar lungo la strada. Ci vediamo lì per un caffè".

translation.en: We sat down, say, "Listen, Jimmy, you need to come talk to us about this
translation.it: Ci sedemmo. "Jimmy, devi venire a parlarne con noi,

translation.en: because it's gonna get serious."
translation.it: la cosa si fa seria.

translation.en: "Extortion, money-laundering, game-fixing."
translation.it: Estorsioni, riciclaggio, partite truccate.

translation.en: "You're facing a good 25 years."
translation.it: Rischi ben 25 anni.

translation.en: "Jimmy, either you get on the train, or you're gonna get run over by it."
translation.it: Jimmy, o sali sul treno o ti travolgeranno".

translation.en: And I'm like, "Fuck you guys. I'm not a rat."
translation.it: Io dissi: "Fanculo, ragazzi. Non sono una spia".

translation.en: [Tim] Me and my family, we had moved down to Florida.
translation.it: Io e la mia famiglia ci eravamo trasferiti in Florida.

translation.en: -We had a nice house. -[family] ♪ Happy birthday… ♪
translation.it: Avevamo una bella casa. …tanti auguri a te!

translation.en: [Tim] Great lifestyle.
translation.it: Un ottimo stile di vita.

translation.en: [Tim] My kids are all doing terrific.
translation.it: I miei figli stavano alla grande.

translation.en: Whoa, Meg! Let off! Let off!
translation.it: Meg! Lascia!

translation.en: [Tim] I was on the driving range at Lakewood Ranch Country Club.
translation.it: Ero sul campo da golf al Lakewood Ranch Country Club.

translation.en: Just getting ready to break out a new set of irons.
translation.it: Mi preparavo a usare un nuovo set di ferri.

translation.en: My phone kept ringing and ringing, and I picked it up. It was Tommy.
translation.it: Il telefono continuava a squillare, così risposi. Era Tommy.

translation.en: And he just said, "Listen, I got something I got to tell you."
translation.it: Mi disse: "Devo dirti una cosa".

translation.en: And I said, "What?" He goes, "The FBI was here."
translation.it: Chiesi: "Cosa?" E lui: "È venuto l'FBI.

translation.en: "A couple times."
translation.it: Un paio di volte".

translation.en: I said to him, "Tommy, they were there two or three times,
translation.it: Io risposi: "Sono già venuti due o tre volte

translation.en: and you're just telling me now?"
translation.it: e me lo dici solo ora?"

translation.en: [Kim] He pulled up in the golf cart,
translation.it: Accostò con il golf-cart,

translation.en: and he came in, and I remember his exact words.
translation.it: entrò e ricordo le sue esatte parole:

translation.en: "That fucking Tommy."
translation.it: "Quel Tommy del cazzo".

translation.en: He would never talk about Tommy like that.
translation.it: Non avrebbe mai parlato di lui così.

translation.en: He said, "I have to talk to you."
translation.it: Mi disse: "Devo parlarti."

translation.en: He was in the fetal position on the bed,
translation.it: Era in posizione fetale sul letto

translation.en: and he said, "I took some money, and I've been doing some things."
translation.it: e disse: "Ho preso dei soldi e ho fatto delle cose".

translation.en: And it just clicked.
translation.it: Fu allora che capii.

translation.en: I just knew, "He's betting on his own games."
translation.it: Lo sapevo. "Scommette sulle sue stesse partite".

translation.en: He was crying, just bawling.
translation.it: Piangeva, singhiozzava.

translation.en: I hugged him. I said, "You know what? We're gonna get through it." "It… It's gonna be fine."
translation.it: Lo abbracciai e dissi: "Sai cosa? Ce la faremo. Andrà tutto bene".

translation.en: And I walked out of the bedroom, I shut the door,
translation.it: Uscii dalla camera, chiusi la porta,

translation.en: and I went into the kitchen, and I threw up in the sink.
translation.it: andai in cucina e vomitai nel lavandino.

translation.en: [Tim] You know, as soon as Tommy called me, I knew I was screwed.
translation.it: Appena Tommy mi chiamò, capii di essere fregato.

translation.en: When you're put in the middle of something like that, you don't sleep,
translation.it: Quando vivi qualcosa del genere,

translation.en: -you don't eat, it just… eats you alive. -[ominous music playing]
translation.it: non dormi, non mangi. Ti divora.

translation.en: -[announcer 1] Down two games to none. -[announcer 2] And Giambi down swinging.
translation.it: Due sconfitte contro zero. Giambi perde al terzo strike.

translation.en: [man] I was sitting at home watching the Yankee game.
translation.it: Ero a casa a guardare la partita degli Yankees.

translation.en: -[dramatic whoosh] -I got a call from Tim.
translation.it: Mi chiamò Tim.

translation.en: He said, "Can you meet tonight?"
translation.it: Disse: "Possiamo vederci stasera?"

translation.en: We met at a restaurant.
translation.it: Ci incontrammo al ristorante.

translation.en: I could tell he was devastated and in bad shape.
translation.it: Si vedeva che era distrutto e in pessime condizioni.

translation.en: My strategy always coming into a case instinctually is to fight.
translation.it: All'inizio di un caso, la mia strategia è sempre quella di combattere.

translation.en: I don't like cooperating. I like fighting. I like going to trial.
translation.it: Non amo collaborare, ma combattere, andare a processo.

translation.en: So my initial reaction was, this is defensible.
translation.it: Quindi, la mia reazione iniziale fu: "È difendibile".

translation.en: And it was defensible from a legal strategic standpoint, initially.
translation.it: Ed era difendibile da un punto di vista legale, all'inizio.

translation.en: It was not defensible from an emotive standpoint.
translation.it: Non era difendibile dal punto di vista emotivo.

translation.en: Tim had to confess.
translation.it: Tim doveva confessare.

translation.en: He had to.
translation.it: Doveva farlo.

translation.en: Moreover, we didn't know what the other characters were doing.
translation.it: Inoltre, non sapevamo cosa stessero facendo gli altri coinvolti.

translation.en: I didn't know where Baba was. He was coming out of rehab.
translation.it: Non sapevo dove fosse Baba. Doveva uscire dalla riabilitazione.

translation.en: I knew that Tommy Martino had been in to the grand jury,
translation.it: Sapevo che Tommy Martino era stato dal gran giurì,

translation.en: which is always a dangerous sign.
translation.it: che è sempre un brutto segno.

translation.en: So we had to make a strategic decision
translation.it: Dovemmo prendere la decisione strategica

translation.en: to go in to the US attorney's office and cooperate fully,
translation.it: di andare dal procuratore e collaborare pienamente,

translation.en: which we did in, like, 48 hours.
translation.it: cosa che facemmo nel giro di 48 ore.

translation.en: It was the quickest I've ever taken a client in.
translation.it: Non c'ero mai arrivato così presto.

translation.en: [Tommy] I go up in front of a grand jury.
translation.it: Andai davanti a un gran giurì.

translation.en: Prosecuting attorney asked me,
translation.it: L'avvocato dell'accusa mi chiese:

translation.en: "What were you doing on the phone with Donaghy for 9,000 minutes a month?"
translation.it: "Cosa si diceva al telefono con Donaghy per 9.000 minuti al mese?"

translation.en: I said, "We were talking about family matters."
